member.name: T:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.ConfigurationKeys
member.summary: Defines the keys used in DI configuration.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.ConfigurationKeys.MaxSessions
member.summary: The maximum number of sessions in a .

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.ConfigurationKeys.ScriptLanguage
member.summary: Used to resolve a with the specified language for a .

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.ConfigurationKeys.BlobConnectionStringName
member.summary: The name of the connection string defining the URL for the blob service endpoint.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.ConfigurationKeys.BlobCertificateConnectionStringName
member.summary: The name of the connection string defining path and password for the blob service client authentication certificate. Certificate must be in PKCS #12 (.p12/.pfx) format and must be located on the Microsoft Machine Learning Server compute nodes.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.ConfigurationKeys.BlobCaConnectionStringName
member.summary: The name of the connection string defining the path to public certificate of certification authority that issued the certificate for the blob service endpoint.Certificate must be in Base64 encoded format and must be located on the Microsoft Machine Learning Server compute nodes.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.ConfigurationKeys.TableDataConnectionStringName
member.summary: The name of the connection string defining the URL for the table data service endpoint.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.ConfigurationKeys.TableDataCertificateConnectionStringName
member.summary: The name of the connection string defining path and password for the table service client authentication certificate. Certificate must be in PKCS #12 (.p12/.pfx) format and must be located on the Microsoft Machine Learning Server compute nodes.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.ConfigurationKeys.TableDataCaConnectionStringName
member.summary: The name of the connection string defining the path to public certificate of certification authority that issued the certificate for the table service endpoint.Certificate must be in Base64 encoded format and must be located on the Microsoft Machine Learning Server compute nodes.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.ConfigurationKeys.DisableTlsCertificateValidation
member.summary: A flag indicating whether invalid certificates from the blob and table data service should be accepted.

member.summary: Escapes special characters in the string for using it in an R script.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.ScriptSessionPool
member.summary: An implementation of where sessions are reused in a pool.
member.remarks: Sessions are created as needed until a maximum number is reached. After this callers of will wait until a session is returned to the pool.
